pre_caption: The video opens with a low-angle, extreme wide shot of an urban alley, with a concrete curb in the immediate foreground. A skateboarder is initially positioned in the left middle ground, next to a large green dumpster. A black car is parked in the left foreground, while a white car is visible further back in the center background. As the skateboarder moves from the left toward the camera, the shot size dynamically increases to a full shot. He then jumps over the foreground curb, moving into the top center of the frame, which briefly becomes a medium shot as his lower body exits the view.
